description: Ensure normal body text (below large-text thresholds) meets a 4.5:1 contrast ratio against its background.
recommendation: Adjust foreground/background colors, overlays, or opacity to achieve at least 4.5:1 for standard text sizes. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.4.3)
algorithm: Extracts explicit foreground/background colors from inline styles, CSS blocks, or XAML Foreground/Background; skips gradients/images/filters; computes contrast ratio and compares against size-based thresholds.
algorithm_advanced: Extracts static foreground/background colors from inline styles, CSS blocks, or XAML Foreground/Background; ignores gradients/images/filters; computes contrast ratio and compares against size/bold thresholds.
